description: This file is the main source code for a FastAPI backend server implementing OAuth flows, user management, and integration endpoints for JIRA and Confluence from Atlassian. It provides routes for OAuth login, callback handling, user creation, and fetching/syncing projects and pages, including alias routes for proxies.

classes.name: SafeJSONFormatter
classes.description: A minimal JSON formatter for structured logs with secret redaction support.

classes.name: RequestIDMiddleware
classes.description: ASGI middleware to assign/propagate X-Request-ID and echo it in responses.

methods.name: logging.Logger _configure_logging()
methods.description: Initializes application logger with JSON formatter and level from environment.

methods.name: str _redact_value(_: Any)
methods.description: Returns redacted placeholder for sensitive data.

methods.name: bool _should_redact(key: str)
methods.description: Determines whether a key should be redacted based on sensitive keys set.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _redact_mapping(mapping: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Returns a redacted copy of a dict for safe logging.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] _get_headers_subset(request: Request)
methods.description: Extracts a safe subset of headers for observability.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _sanitized_query_params(request: Request)
methods.description: Returns a redacted snapshot of query parameters.

methods.name: None _log_event( level: int, event: str, request: Request, provider: Optional[str] = None, status_code: Optional[int] = None, **fields: Any, )
methods.description: Centralized structured logging with common request context.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Endpoint for health status.

methods.name: healthz()
methods.description: Readiness probe endpoint.

methods.name: jira_login( request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None, redirect: Optional[bool] = False, )
methods.description: Initiates Jira OAuth2 login, returning auth URL or redirect.

methods.name: jira_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles OAuth callback, exchanges code for tokens, stores them, and redirects.

methods.name: create_user_endpoint(payload: UserCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new user record.

methods.name: list_users_endpoint(db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Lists all users.

methods.name: get_user_endpoint(user_id: int, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves a user by ID.

methods.name: confluence_login(request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Starts Confluence OAuth2 login, redirect to Atlassian.

methods.name: confluence_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles Confluence OAuth callback, stores tokens, redirects.

methods.name: connect_jira(db=Depends(get_db), payload: UserCreate | None = None)
methods.description: Sets up JIRA connection guidance for user.

methods.name: connect_confluence(db=Depends(get_db), payload: UserCreate | None = None)
methods.description: Sets up Confluence connection guidance for user.

methods.name: fetch_jira_projects(db=Depends(get_db), owner_id: int | None = None)
methods.description: Fetches stored or placeholder JIRA projects for a user.

methods.name: fetch_confluence_pages(db=Depends(get_db), owner_id: int | None = None)
methods.description: Fetches stored or placeholder Confluence pages for a user.

methods.name: upsert_jira_project_endpoint(payload: JiraProjectCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Create or update a JIRA project.

methods.name: list_jira_projects_endpoint(owner_id: int, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Lists all JIRA projects for a user.

methods.name: upsert_confluence_page_endpoint(payload: ConfluencePageCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Create or update a Confluence page.

methods.name: list_confluence_pages_endpoint(owner_id: int, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Lists all Confluence pages for a user.

methods.name: _ensure_target_user(db, request: Request, state: Optional[str])
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _ocean_response(data: Any, message: str = "ok")
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _parse_state_map(raw_state: Optional[str])
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: _resolve_user_from_state(db, state: Optional[str])
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: atlassian_callback_alias(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: confluence_callback_api_alias(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: confluence_login_api_alias(request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: dispatch(self, request: Request, call_next)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: str format(self, record: logging.LogRecord)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: global_exception_handler(request: Request, exc: Exception)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: jira_callback_api_alias(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: jira_login_api_alias( request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None, redirect: Optional[bool] = False, )
methods.description: unavailable

ctags.name: _SETTINGS_INTERNAL
ctags.pattern: /^from src.api.oauth_config import _SETTINGS as _SETTINGS_INTERNAL  # safe import inside backend$/

ctags.name: _log_event
ctags.signature: ( level: int, event: str, request: Request, provider: Optional[str] = None, status_code: Optional[int] = None, **fields: Any, )

ctags.name: atlassian_callback_alias
ctags.pattern: /^async def atlassian_callback_alias(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = N/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: confluence_callback
ctags.pattern: /^async def confluence_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, /
ctags.signature: (request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: confluence_callback_api_alias
ctags.pattern: /^async def confluence_callback_api_alias(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: confluence_login
ctags.pattern: /^def confluence_login(request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: confluence_login_api_alias
ctags.pattern: /^def confluence_login_api_alias(request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[st/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: dispatch
ctags.pattern: /^    async def dispatch(self, request: Request, call_next):$/

ctags.name: jira_callback
ctags.pattern: /^async def jira_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state:/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: jira_callback_api_alias
ctags.pattern: /^async def jira_callback_api_alias(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = No/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: jira_login
ctags.signature: ( request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None, redirect: Optional[bool] = False, )

ctags.name: jira_login_api_alias
ctags.signature: ( request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None, redirect: Optional[bool] = False, )

ctags.name: origins
ctags.pattern: /^origins = [o.strip() for o in cors_origins_raw.split(",")] if cors_origins_raw else ["*"]$/

fields.name: origins = [o.strip() for o in cors_origins_raw.split(",")] if cors_origins_raw else ["*"]
